description: An end-to-end ETL pipeline for processing e-commerce data, including data extraction, transformation, and loading into a data warehouse.
A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
Productionized Airflow DAGs orchestrating ingestion, staging, SCD updates, and warehouse loads for the e-commerce pipeline.
Implements SCD2 logic for customer and product dimensions with effective dating, end dating, and current record flags.
Great Expectations-style checks and row-level validations for incoming CSV snapshots prior to loading the warehouse.
Generates daily customer/product snapshots to simulate change data for testing SCD logic and incremental loads.
Interactive dashboards tracking sales trends, inventory turns, and margin performance using a star schema.
A small app to track job applications, company research, interview stages, and notes with exportable reports.
A small app2 to track job applications, company research, interview stages, and notes with exportable reports.
Aggregates workout logs to analyze pace trends, volume, and race-readiness with simple progress visualizations.
Usage analytics pipeline and report for Teams/SharePoint activity to inform adoption and governance decisions.
Reusable Vue components (cards, charts wrappers, nav) with Tailwind utilities for rapid UI prototyping.
A small Python utilities package for CSV validation, schema checks, and PostgreSQL helpers used across projects.
